text: @PresidencyZA @CyrilRamaphosa Mr President.  You've granted us the right to buy in you addressing the Nation... now taking it away.  We as smokers place less risk to spreading COVID19 than opening of schools, public transport, with restriction of where we allowed to smoke is worse than getting in a taxi.
